QuestData.Title: And the Elekk Too?!
QuestData.Description: The little stuffed elekk has seen better days. It's torn and the stuffing is poking out.$b$bThe name Caleb is sewn onto the bottom of the left back foot. Sher'khaan must have snatched it from the cart. The little draenei might appreciate its return.
QuestData.LogDescription: Return Ricky to Caleb at the overturned cart.
QuestData.RewardText: Oh thank you, $gmister:ma'am;! I can't believe Sher'khaan got Ricky!$b$bYou're my hero!
